metadata.name: Potential Persistence Via Netsh Helper DLL
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of netsh with "add helper" flag in order to add a custom helper DLL. This technique can be abused to add a malicious helper DLL that can be used as a persistence proxy that gets called when netsh.exe is executed.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('netsh.exe') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\netsh.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('helper')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of netsh with "add helper" flag in order to add a custom helper DLL. This technique can be abused to add a malicious helper DLL that can be used as a persistence proxy that gets called when netsh.exe is executed.
